content: reference/archive purposes, this can greatly simplify that task as well. Name Value User ID Order number Order name Date/Time Appendix B. Reference, cheat sheets, blank worksheets, and education 483 Hardware Management Console In Chapter 5.3, “Installing z/VM from a DVD or an FTP server” on page 110, we describe how to start a z/VM installation from the Hardware Management Console (HMC). Complete Table B-3 to record the values that you will use. Table B-3 HMC values z/VM Installation Planning Panels (INSTPLAN) In Chapter 5.4.2, “In-memory z/VM system loaded” on page 113, we describe the INSTPLAN command under step number 2 on page 115 that is run from the Integrated 3270 Console. The following information will be necessary. INSTPLAN panels 1 and 2 Complete Table B-4 to record the values that are required in the first two INSTPLAN panels. Table B-4 INSTPLAN values for the first two panels Name Value HMC location or URL HMC user ID FTP source system (if installing from FTP) z/VM
